enhanced_description: PT. Exa Mitra Solusi (EXA) is a Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) provider established in 2004, offering over 20 years of experience in the outsourcing industry. They provide a comprehensive suite of power services, including recruitment, marketing & sales outsourcing, operation outsourcing, customer service (encompassing contact center, telemarketing, and desk collection), and training for human resource development. EXA's solutions are designed to enable clients from various industries to focus on their core business processes, deliver consistent service levels to their customers, and achieve growth. Their key objectives include boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, and helping organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently.
